column6:
Everything old is new again as the New T-Bolts resume their original numbering! A 100th issue giant-sized extravaganza featuring ZEMO vs. PHOTON! And the winner will save the universe! The return of Moonstone! M.A.C.H. IV vs. Songbird! And a T-Bolt makes the ultimate sacrifice for redemption! And by the time the smoke clears, the Thunderbolts will have been shaken to their core! Features an all-new full length story, plus Special Centennial Anniversary Materials!,2006,3
104 PGS./T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP ...$3.99
column8: | inker:Gary Erskine | penciller (cover):Tom Grummett | writer:Fabian Nicieza | colorist:Chris Sotomayor | letterer:Richard Starkings
